companies.name: imgix
companies.description: The platform for your visual media.
companies.hiring_description: At imgix, we are building the "graphics card" for the Internet. We provide image and visual media processing on-demand via a URL-based API. We connect to a customer's existing images (e.g. S3 bucket) and then provide a domain they can use to access those images dynamically, creating any number of sizes, crops, adjustments, and other variants of those images. Think of it like Photoshop's "Save for Web" feature but for a million images at a time.
companies.tech_description: We maintain two separate technology stacks, one designed to perform all of the image processing we do and one for configuring those image processing pipelines for customers. Our image processing infrastructure is built using technologies such as haproxy, varnish, Lua, Go, Objective-C and C++. It handles >100K qps of requests and >10K qps of image renders. Our configuration and customer management stack is built on Python, Mongo, mySQL, nodejs, and Angular.
companies.one_liner: The platform for your visual media.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
**Job Description**

Imgix is a chief platform for real-time image management, optimization, and delivery services. Our innovative technology empowers businesses to deliver high-quality visual experiences to their customers across various platforms and devices, anywhere in the world.

Imgix is striving to combine images, data, and intelligence to solve our customers’ problems. You will be working with cutting edge technologies and have the opportunity to greatly impact and influence the direction of the company. You will work closely with the larger engineering team to design, develop, deploy, and operate the high-performance, high-availability media platform that our customers rely on. You will also have the opportunity to operationalize AI technologies and create custom AI models for our clients including some of the largest sites on the internet.

**What you’ll be doing:**

* Take customer problems, design elegant solutions, break those solutions down into technical deliverables and deliver value to our customers.
* Write clean and well-tested code, with an eye for maintainability and performance.
* Evaluate trade-offs between correctness, robustness, performance and time.
* Contribute thoughtfully to architecture and design decisions for scalable, highly available systems.
* Communicate and collaborate to work effectively in a team.
* Mentor junior and mid-level developers.

**What we’re looking for:**

* 3+ years of experience with Python, Java, Go, C#, or similar.
* 1-2 years of experience in C or C++.
* Ability to design, develop, administer, and maintain reliable, scalable services that work with massive amounts of visual media on the cloud, across geographic regions.
* Experience with research and experimentation to build proof of concepts that solve business problems, scale them into functional MVPs and bring innovative concepts to life.
* Proven ability to lead projects from specification to delivery while collaborating with other engineers and cross-functional team members.
* Experience working in a fast-paced, high-growth environment that focuses on shipping value to our customers.
* Bonus qualifications:
  * Experience with CUDA or compute in Vulkan/OpenGL.
  * Familiarity with image recognition or computer vision or OpenCV.
  * Experience with creating scalable HTTP APIs.
  * Familiarity with AI model training and usage.

**About Imgix:**

Imgix is building the future of visual media on the Internet that will combine images, data, and intelligence to solve our customers’ problems. Imgix operates the premier solution to deliver impactful, engaging, highly responsive and super fast imagery to eyeballs around the world. Our service consists of a top tier media delivery platform tightly coupled with Imgix's proprietary, on-demand image and video processing pipeline. It provides customers with the ability to combine the most efficient pixel manipulation render stack with a robust AI feature set to take full advantage of their visual media. Imgix enables our customers to greatly increase the value of their imagery and get back to building awesome things.

The targeted base pay range for this position is $140,000 to $200,000. Our pay ranges reflect the minimum and maximum target for new hire pay for the full-time position calculated by role, level, and location. Your pay is based on additional factors including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education and/or training. The targeted pay range listed reflects the base pay only and does not include bonus, equity, or benefits.

Imgix currently operates as a mostly remote workplace with employees distributed around the world. In this role, you will join a 100% remote team, while still having the option of being based in our San Francisco office. Employee benefits are comprehensive (401(k), medical, dental, and vision), perks are generous, vacation time is unlimited, parental leave is available and highly encouraged, and salaries are in line with industry norms. We also provide engineers with equipment and peripherals to be effective in their work: funky keyboards, standing desks, and gear to develop on.

For the health and safety of all of our employees, Imgix requires COVID-19 vaccinations for any employee who wishes to work out of the San Francisco office or attend in-person company events.

Imgix is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description:
### **About the Role**

We’re looking for a talented and passionate UX/UI Designer to join our fast-growing startup and play a crucial role in shaping our product’s user experience. You'll be at the intersection of design and technology, crafting intuitive and visually compelling interfaces that make complex AI-driven fintech solutions accessible and engaging. This is an opportunity to have a direct impact on our product’s design language, usability, and overall user satisfaction.

### **What You'll Own**

* Define and execute the **UX/UI vision** for our platform, ensuring seamless and engaging user interactions.
* Own and maintain a **scalable design system**, fostering consistency across all products.
* Conduct **user research** and leverage insights to create user-centric designs.
* Collaborate with **developers** to ensure high-quality implementation of your designs.
* Advocate for **best practices in UX, usability, and accessibility** throughout the team.

### **What You'll Do**

#### **User Experience & Design**

* Design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces that enhance usability.
* Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI designs in **Figma** (or similar tools).
* Conduct **user testing and research** to inform design decisions.
* Work closely with product and engineering teams to bring designs to life.
* Evolve and maintain a **comprehensive design system**.

#### **Collaboration & Strategy**

* Partner with developers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation.
* Translate complex business requirements into elegant, **user-friendly solutions**.
* Stay up to date with the latest UX/UI trends and best practices.
* Contribute to shaping our product strategy and roadmap.

### **What You Bring**

#### **Essential Experience**

* 4+ years of professional experience in UX/UI design
* Strong portfolio showcasing UX/UI design work, including wireframes, prototypes, and final designs
* Experience designing for web applications, preferably in fintech, SaaS, or AI-driven products
* Proficiency in modern design tools such as Figma, Replit, or other similar tools
* Strong understanding of usability, accessibility, and user psychology

#### **Technical & Design Skills**

* Expertise in designing for responsive and interactive web applications
* Strong visual design skills, with an eye for typography, color, and layout
* Experience building and maintaining design systems
* Familiarity with frontend development concepts (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus
* Ability to create interactive prototypes and conduct usability testing

### **The Ideal Candidate**

* Has a deep passion for creating seamless, beautiful user experiences
* Thrives in a fast-paced startup environment and enjoys wearing multiple hats
* Is a strong advocate for user-centered design and accessibility
* Enjoys collaborating with engineers and product teams to bring designs to life
* Is excited about working on AI-powered fintech solutions

**Why Join Us?**

* Opportunity to shape the direction of a cutting-edge AI-powered platform
* Work with a passionate team dedicated to innovation
* Flexible remote work culture with bi-weekly team meetups in Downtown Toronto/San Francisco
* Competitive compensation package
* Ground-floor opportunity at a growing startup
* Real impact on product decisions and company direction

**Our Work Style**

We're a remote-first team that values independence and ownership, coming together every 2-3 weeks at our Downtown Toronto/San Francisco office for collaboration and team building. We believe in giving our team members the autonomy to drive innovation while providing the support needed to succeed.

**Compensation**

We offer a competitive compensation package commensurate with experience. We're looking for someone who wants to grow with us and will reward that commitment accordingly.

If you're excited about creating amazing user experiences and want to be part of a team that's pushing the boundaries of AI in fintech, we want to hear from you!

### About the Role

We're looking for an ambitious, driven Founding Account Executive to join our rapidly growing startup. You will play a crucial role as an Individual Contributor in shaping our go-to-market strategy, securing key partnerships, and accelerating revenue growth. This is your chance to join at the ground floor, influence strategic decisions, and contribute directly to our trajectory.

### What You'll Own

### What You'll Do

**Sales Execution**

* Prospect and close high-impact opportunities, owning ambitious revenue targets
* Leverage relationships within YC and broader startup ecosystems to accelerate customer acquisition in financial services, insurance, healthcare, and technology sectors.
* Build trusted relationships with senior stakeholders, understanding their business needs deeply

**Growth & Partnerships**

* Identify strategic channel and distribution partners to amplify growth
* Collaborate closely with founders to build sales infrastructure and a scalable growth engine
* Evangelize the Senso vision, becoming a recognized thought leader in conversational intelligence and knowledge management

### What You Bring

**Essential Experience**

* 5+ years in B2B SaaS sales, ideally selling AI, conversational intelligence, or related products
* Demonstrated history of exceeding ambitious sales targets and managing complex sales cycles
* Experience building foundational sales processes and strategies at an early-stage startup
* Strong professional network, particularly within fintech, SaaS, or AI industries

**Skills & Competencies**

* Exceptional ability to articulate complex solutions clearly and persuasively
* Deep understanding of consultative selling methodologies
* Comfortable operating independently in fast-paced, ambiguous startup environments
* Proven ability to build rapport and credibility at executive levels

### The Ideal Candidate

* Has entrepreneurial spirit and thrives in environments with high autonomy
* Is energized by ambitious targets and rapid growth
* Has a proven track record in closing enterprise deals and establishing key partnerships
* Demonstrates intellectual curiosity and passion for transformative technology

### Why Join Us?

* Opportunity to shape the future of a disruptive AI-powered conversational intelligence platform
* Work directly with founders and a highly talented, ambitious team
* Competitive compensation package, including equity incentives

### Our Work Style

We are remote-first, value ownership and autonomy, and foster a supportive environment that emphasizes rapid execution and growth. Team meetups occur regularly in Toronto and San Francisco to enhance collaboration and strategy alignment.

### Compensation

Competitive salary ($100K - $130K base, 500k OTE, plus equity).

If you’re passionate about driving transformative growth, selling innovative products, and want to help shape the future of conversational intelligence, we’d love to connect with you!
